metadata.titleEn: Dataset of Heihe integrated observatory network: eddy covariance system of Sidaoqiao superstation, 2022
metadata.titleCn: 黑河流域地表过程综合观测网：四道桥超级站涡动相关仪（2022）
metadata.description:
This dataset contains the flux measurements from the Sidaoqiao superstation eddy covariance system (EC) in the downstream reaches of the Heihe integrated observatory network from January 1 to December 31 in 2022. The site (101.1374° E, 42.0012° N) was located in the Ejina Banner in Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region . The elevation is 873 m. The EC was installed at a height of 3.2 m, and the sampling rate was 10 Hz. The sonic anemometer faced north, and the separation distance between the sonic anemometer and the CO2/H2O gas analyzer (CSAT3&Li7500A) was 0.15 m.
The raw data acquired at 10 Hz were processed using the Eddypro post-processing software, including the spike detection, lag correction of H2O/CO2 relative to the vertical wind component, sonic virtual temperature correction, coordinate rotation (2-D rotation), corrections for density fluctuation (Webb-Pearman-Leuning correction), and frequency response correction. The EC data were subsequently averaged over 30 min periods. The observation data quality was divided into three classes according to the quality assessment method of stationarity (Δst) and the integral turbulent characteristics test (ITC): class 1-3 (high quality), class 4-6 (good), class 7-8 (poor, better than gap filling data), class9 (rejected). In addition to the above processing steps, the half-hourly flux data were screened in a four-step procedure: (1) data from periods of sensor malfunction were rejected; (2) data collected before or after 1 h of precipitation were rejected; (3) incomplete 30 min data were rejected when the missing data constituted more than 10% of the 30 min raw record. There were 48 records per day, and the missing data were replaced with -6999. Suspicious data were marked in red. 
The released data contained the following variables: data/time, wind direction (Wdir, °), wind speed (Wnd, m/s), the standard deviation of the lateral wind (Std_Uy, m/s), virtual temperature (Tv, ℃), H2O mass density (H2O, g/m3), CO2 mass density (CO2, mg/m3), friction velocity (ustar, m/s), stability (L), sensible heat flux (Hs, W/m2), latent heat flux (LE, W/m2), carbon dioxide flux (Fc, mg/ (m2s)), quality assessment of the sensible heat flux (QA_Hs), quality assessment of the latent heat flux (QA_LE), and quality assessment of the carbon flux (QA_Fc). In this dataset, the time of 0:30 corresponds to the average data for the period between 0:00 and 0:30; the data were stored in *.xls format. Detailed information can be found in the suggested references.
For more information, please refer to Liu et al. (2018) (for sites information), Liu et al. (2011) for data processing) in the Citation section.
metadata.descriptionCn:
该数据集包含了2022年1月1日至2022年12月31日的黑河流域地表过程综合观测网下游四道桥超级站涡动相关仪观测数据。站点位于内蒙古额济纳旗四道桥，下垫面是柽柳。观测点的经纬度是101.1374E, 42.0012N，海拔873 m。涡动相关仪的架高8m，采样频率是10Hz，超声朝向是正北向，超声风速温度仪（CSAT3）与CO2/H2O分析仪（Li7500）之间的距离是15cm。
涡动相关仪的原始观测数据为10Hz，发布的数据是采用Eddypro软件处理的30分钟数据，其处理的主要步骤包括：野点值剔除，延迟时间校正，坐标旋转（二次坐标旋转），频率响应修正，超声虚温修正和密度（WPL）修正等。同时对各通量值进行质量评价，主要是大气平稳性（Δst）和湍流相似性特征（ITC）的检验。对Eddypro软件输出的30min通量值也进行了筛选：（1）剔除仪器出错时的数据；（2）剔除降水前后1h的数据；（3）剔除10Hz原始数据中每30min内缺失率大于10%的数据。观测数据的平均周期为30分钟，一天48个数据，缺失数据标记为-6999。
发布的观测数据包括：日期/时间Date/Time，风向Wdir（°），水平风速Wnd（m/s），侧向风速标准差Std_Uy（m/s），超声虚温Tv（℃），水汽密度H2O（g/m3），二氧化碳浓度CO2（mg/m3），摩擦速度Ustar（m/s），奥布霍夫长度L（m），感热通量Hs（W/m2），潜热通量LE（W/m2），二氧化碳通量Fc（mg/(m2s)），感热通量的质量标识QA_Hs，潜热通量的质量标识QA_LE，二氧化碳通量的质量标识QA_Fc。感热、潜热、二氧化碳通量的质量标识分为九级（质量标识1-3数据质量好，4-6数据质量较好，7-8数据质量较差（较插补数据好）；9数据质量差））。数据时间的含义，如0:30代表0:00-0:30的平均；数据以*.xls格式存储。
黑河流域地表过程综合观测网或站点信息请参考Liu et al. (2018)，观测数据处理请参考Liu et al. (2011)。

background: Arid and semiarid regions represent approximately 30 % of the global terrestrial surface area (Dregne, 1991; Scanlon et al., 2006), and dryland expansion occurs under climate change, especially in developing countries (Huang et al., 2016). An oasis is a unique ecological landscape in arid and semi-arid areas that is not only the core of regions’ ecological environment but also the foundation of their economic development, especially in western China, which has been an important part of the “Silk Road” since ancient times. Oases comprising less than 10 % of the total area of arid regions support more than 90 % of the population in these regions of China (Chu et al., 2005; Li et al., 2016; Zhou et al., 2022). The oasis–desert system plays a crucial role in maintaining a stable ecological environment and agricultural productivity (Zhang and Zhao, 2015). Extensive studies have investigated energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas based on field and remote-sensing observations (Taha et al., 1991; Potchter et al., 2008; Xue et al., 2019; Wang et al., 2019; Zhou et al., 2022) and numerical simulations (Chu et al., 2005; Meng et al., 2009; Georgescu et al., 2011; Liu et al., 2020). In addition, oasis–desert areas located in semiarid regions have been found to be carbon sinks by previous researchers (Tagesson et al., 2016; Wang et al., 2019); thus, they can significantly affect the carbon balance of arid regions and play an increasingly important role within the global carbon cycle.
research objective: Therefore, it is critical to maintain the balance between oasis and desert systems in order to achieve the goal of sustainable oasis development. Understanding the basic characteristics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems is important to achieve the goals of carbon peaking and carbon neutrality in the oasis–desert area and support the ecological security and sustainable development of the oasis. A quantitative understanding of the energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas is crucial to recognize the oasis–desert interactions and is significant to protect the ecological stability and socioeconomic development of oases; moreover, long-term observations are indispensable.
challenges: Inland river basins in arid and semiarid areas are facing the crisis of ecological environment degradation, such as the drying up of rivers and lakes, the degradation of natural vegetation, the intensification of land desertification, and the frequent occurrence of dust storms, especially in many inland river basins westward along the Silk Road, such as the Tarim River basin (Zhao et al., 2013), the Aral Sea basin (Stanev et al., 2004; Crétaux et al., 2009), and the Lake Urmia basin (Stone, 2015).
methods: In this study, we present a suite of observational datasets from artificial and natural oasis–desert systems that consist of long-term energy, water vapor, carbon and methane fluxes as well as auxiliary data involving hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil parameters from 2012 to 2021. Half-hourly turbulent flux data were acquired by an eddy covariance system and scintillometer. The hydrometeorological data (including radiation, soil heat flux, and soil temperature profiles; gradients of air temperature and humidity and of wind speed and direction; and air pressure, precipitation, and soil moisture profiles) were observed from automatic weather stations with a 10 min average period as well as the groundwater table data. Moreover, vegetation and soil parameters were also supplemented in the datasets. The data processing and quality control procedure can be divided into data collection, data processing, and data archiving and sharing.
dataset: The study area comprises the middle and lower reaches of the HRB, located in the arid regions of western China, that receive water from the typical cryosphere of the upper reaches. A total of 11 land surface flux and meteorological stations have been established in these regions since 2012 – 2 superstations and 9 ordinary stations. The dataset of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange observations in oasis–desert areas reported in this study (including energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes; hydrometeorological data; and vegetation and soil parameters) is freely available from the National Tibetan Plateau Data Center.
backgroundCn: 干旱和半干旱地区约占全球陆地表面积的30%（Dregne, 1991；Scanlon et al., 2006），在气候变化的影响下，干旱地区的扩展尤其发生在发展中国家（Huang et al., 2016）。绿洲是干旱和半干旱地区独特的生态景观，不仅是这些地区生态环境的核心，也是其经济发展的基础，特别是在中国西部，自古以来就一直是“丝绸之路”的重要组成部分。绿洲占干旱地区总面积的不到10%，却支持着中国这些地区90%以上的人口（Chu et al., 2005；Li et al., 2016；Zhou et al., 2022）。绿洲-沙漠系统在维持稳定的生态环境和农业生产力方面发挥着至关重要的作用（Zhang and Zhao, 2015）。大量研究基于实地和遥感观测（Taha et al., 1991；Potchter et al., 2008；Xue et al., 2019；Wang et al., 2019；Zhou et al., 2022）以及数值模拟（Chu et al., 2005；Meng et al., 2009；Georgescu et al., 2011；Liu et al., 2020）对绿洲-沙漠地区的能量、水汽和碳交换进行了广泛研究。此外，位于半干旱地区的绿洲-沙漠地区已被先前研究者发现是碳汇（Tagesson et al., 2016；Wang et al., 2019）；因此，它们可以显著影响干旱地区的碳平衡，并在全球碳循环中发挥越来越重要的作用。
research objectiveCn: 因此，维持绿洲与沙漠系统之间的平衡对于实现可持续绿洲发展的目标至关重要。了解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水汽和碳交换的基本特征，对于实现绿洲-沙漠地区的碳达峰和碳中和目标，以及支持绿洲的生态安全和可持续发展是非常重要的。对绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换的定量理解，对于认识绿洲-沙漠之间的相互作用至关重要，并且对保护绿洲的生态稳定性和社会经济发展具有重要意义；此外，长期观测是不可或缺的。
challengesCn: 内陆河流流域在干旱和半干旱地区面临生态环境退化的危机，例如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧以及沙尘暴频繁发生，尤其是在丝绸之路沿线的许多内陆河流流域，如塔里木河流域（赵等，2013），咸海流域（Stanev等，2004；Crétaux等，2009）和乌尔米湖流域（Stone，2015）。
methodsCn: 在本研究中，我们呈现了一套来自人工和自然绿洲–沙漠系统的观测数据集，包括2012年至2021年的长期能量、水蒸气、碳和甲烷通量，以及涉及水文气象、植被和土壤参数的辅助数据。半小时的湍流通量数据通过涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪获取。水文气象数据（包括辐射、土壤热通量和土壤温度剖面；空气温度和湿度的梯度，风速和风向的梯度；空气压力、降水和土壤湿度剖面）通过自动气象站以10分钟的平均周期观测，同时还观察了地下水位数据。此外，数据集中还补充了植被和土壤参数。数据处理和质量控制程序可以分为数据收集、数据处理和数据归档与共享。
datasetCn: 研究区域包括位于中国西部干旱地区的HRB中下游，水源来自上游典型的冰冻圈。自2012年以来，在这些地区建立了11个地表通量和气象站，包括2个超级站和9个普通站。本研究报告的绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换观测数据集（包括能量、水汽和碳通量；水文气象数据；以及植被和土壤参数）可从国家西藏高原数据中心免费获取。

Verification.QuestionEn: Are the data collection methods used in the superstation consistent with those used in other ordinary stations within the oasis–desert systems?
Verification.QuestionCn: 超级站使用的数据收集方法是否与绿洲-沙漠系统内其他普通站点使用的方法一致？

Verification.QuestionEn: Is the raw observational data from the eddy covariance system processed to a 30-minute average using Eddypro software?
Verification.QuestionCn: 涡动协方差系统的原始观测数据是否使用Eddypro软件处理为30分钟平均值？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Is the data collection method for surface processes in arid regions more reliant on eddy covariance systems, scintillometers, or automatic weather stations?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 在干旱地区，表面过程的数据收集方法更依赖于涡度协方差系统、闪烁仪还是自动气象站？
Disjunctive.AnswerCn: 涡度相关系统和闪烁仪

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Are datasets for energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange observations in oasis–desert areas more commonly available from the National Tibetan Plateau Data Center or other data repositories?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠地区，能源、水汽和碳交换观测的数据集更常见于国家西藏高原数据中心还是其他数据存储库？
Disjunctive.AnswerCn: 国家青藏高原数据中心

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: Where is the typical location for establishing land surface flux and meteorological stations in the context of studying oasis-desert interactions?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在研究绿洲-沙漠相互作用的背景下，建立地表通量和气象站的典型位置在哪里？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What are the challenges faced by inland river basins in arid and semiarid areas, particularly those along the Silk Road?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 内陆河流域在干旱和半干旱地区，特别是丝绸之路沿线面临的挑战有哪些？

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of data collection techniques used to monitor energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供用于监测绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水蒸气和碳交换的数据收集技术的示例？
Example.AnswerEn: In the oasis–desert ecosystems, data collection techniques include the use of eddy covariance systems and scintillometers to acquire half-hourly turbulent flux data. Additionally, hydrometeorological data such as radiation, soil heat flux, soil temperature profiles, and gradients of air temperature and humidity are observed from automatic weather stations.
Example.AnswerCn: 在绿洲–沙漠生态系统中，数据收集技术包括使用涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪来获取半小时的湍流通量数据。此外，还通过自动气象站观察水文气象数据，如辐射、土壤热通量、土壤温度剖面以及空气温度和湿度的梯度。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge faced when collecting long-term observation data in arid inland river basins?
Example.QuestionCn: 在干旱内陆河流流域收集长期观察数据时面临的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: A challenge faced in arid inland river basins involves ecological environment degradation, including the drying up of rivers and lakes, degradation of natural vegetation, intensification of land desertification, and frequent occurrence of dust storms, which complicates long-term data collection efforts.
Example.AnswerCn: 内陆干旱河流流域面临的一个挑战是生态环境退化，包括河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧以及频繁发生的沙尘暴，这使得长期数据收集工作变得复杂。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the distinct features of observational datasets used to study oasis–desert ecosystems?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 用于研究绿洲-沙漠生态系统的观察性数据集的独特特征是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: long-term data on energy, water vapor, carbon and methane fluxes, auxiliary data on hydrometeorology, vegetation, soil parameters, half-hourly data collection using eddy covariance systems, additional meteorological measurements at 10-minute intervals
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 长期能量、水汽、碳和甲烷通量数据，水文气象、植被、土壤参数的辅助数据，使用涡度相关系统进行半小时数据收集，额外的气象测量每10分钟进行一次。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the essential characteristics of datasets published for understanding the exchange processes in oasis–desert systems?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 用于理解绿洲-沙漠系统中交换过程的数据集的基本特征是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: energy fluxes, water vapor fluxes, carbon fluxes, hydrometeorological data, vegetation parameters, soil parameters, data quality levels, Excel format
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 能量通量、水汽通量、碳通量、水文气象数据、植被参数、土壤参数、数据质量等级、Excel格式

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the sampling frequency of data collection for the eddy covariance system in the observational network?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 观测网络中涡度协方差系统的数据采集采样频率是多少？

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the average period for hydrometeorological data collection from automatic weather stations?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 自动气象站的水文气象数据收集的平均周期是多少？

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'eddy covariance system' mean in the context of data collection in arid and semiarid regions?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区的数据收集背景下，“涡度协方差系统”是什么意思。
Definition.AnswerEn: An eddy covariance system in this context refers to a method used to measure and calculate vertical turbulent fluxes within the atmosphere, such as energy, water vapor, and carbon dioxide, typically employed in arid and semi-arid regions to study oasis–desert ecosystems. This method involves instruments like ultrasonic anemometers and gas analyzers to capture high-frequency data on wind speed, temperature, and gas concentrations.
Definition.AnswerCn: 在这个上下文中，涡度协方差系统指的是一种用于测量和计算大气中垂直湍流通量的方法，例如能量、水蒸气和二氧化碳，通常用于研究干旱和半干旱地区的绿洲-沙漠生态系统。这种方法涉及超声波风速计和气体分析仪等仪器，以捕获风速、温度和气体浓度的高频数据。

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the significance of 'oasis–desert interactions' in understanding ecological stability?
Definition.QuestionCn: “绿洲-沙漠互动”在理解生态稳定性方面的重要性是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: The significance of 'oasis–desert interactions' lies in their crucial role in maintaining the ecological stability and agricultural productivity within oasis regions. Understanding these interactions helps in managing the balance of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchanges, ultimately supporting ecological security and sustainable socioeconomic development in arid and semi-arid areas.
Definition.AnswerCn: “绿洲-沙漠互动”的重要性在于它们在维持绿洲地区生态稳定性和农业生产力方面发挥着关键作用。理解这些互动有助于管理能量、水汽和碳交换的平衡，最终支持干旱和半干旱地区的生态安全和可持续社会经济发展。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the similarities and differences in data collection challenges between oases in the HRB and other inland river basins, like the Tarim River basin, in terms of environmental degradation?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 在HRB（河流流域）中的绿洲与其他内陆河流流域，如塔里木河流域，在环境退化方面的数据收集挑战有哪些相似之处和不同之处？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Both the HRB and the Tarim River basin face challenges such as river drying, vegetation degradation, land desertification, and dust storms. However, the specific environmental and climatic conditions leading to these challenges may differ, affecting the data collection approaches and the focus of ecological monitoring efforts in each region.
Comparison.AnswerCn: HRB和塔里木河流域都面临着河流干涸、植被退化、土地沙漠化和沙尘暴等挑战。然而，导致这些挑战的具体环境和气候条件可能有所不同，这会影响各地区的数据收集方法和生态监测工作的重点。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How can the observed patterns in energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange data inform sustainable development practices in oasis-desert ecosystems?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 观察到的能量、水蒸气和碳交换数据的模式如何为绿洲-沙漠生态系统中的可持续发展实践提供信息。
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The observed patterns in energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange data can provide insights into the interactions between oasis and desert systems, which are crucial for maintaining ecological stability and supporting the socioeconomic development of oases. This understanding is significant for achieving the goals of carbon peaking and carbon neutrality and ensuring the ecological security of these regions.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 观察到的能量、水汽和碳交换数据的模式可以提供对绿洲与沙漠系统之间相互作用的洞察，这对于维持生态稳定和支持绿洲的社会经济发展至关重要。这种理解对于实现碳达峰和碳中和的目标以及确保这些地区的生态安全具有重要意义。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What challenges in data collection and processing might arise from the environmental conditions in arid and semiarid inland river basins, and how can these be mitigated?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱内陆河流流域，数据收集和处理可能面临哪些挑战，以及如何缓解这些挑战？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Challenges in data collection and processing may include ecological environment degradation such as drying rivers, vegetation degradation, intensified desertification, and dust storms. These challenges can be mitigated by employing long-term observational datasets, using advanced data processing techniques like Eddypro software for quality control, and ensuring a comprehensive data collection strategy that includes hydrometeorological, vegetation, and soil parameters.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 数据收集和处理中的挑战可能包括生态环境退化，如河流干涸、植被退化、沙漠化加剧和沙尘暴。这些挑战可以通过采用长期观测数据集、使用先进的数据处理技术（如Eddypro软件进行质量控制）以及确保全面的数据收集策略（包括水文气象、植被和土壤参数）来缓解。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How might the integration of half-hourly turbulent flux data and hydrometeorological observations enhance the understanding of oasis-desert interactions?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 半小时的湍流通量数据与水文气象观测的整合如何增强对绿洲-沙漠相互作用的理解？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The integration of half-hourly turbulent flux data with hydrometeorological observations enhances the understanding of oasis-desert interactions by providing a comprehensive picture of energy, water vapor, carbon and methane fluxes, and other environmental parameters. This approach allows for a quantitative understanding of these exchanges, which is crucial for recognizing oasis-desert interactions and supporting ecological and socioeconomic stability.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 半小时的湍流通量数据与水文气象观测的结合，增强了对绿洲-沙漠相互作用的理解，提供了能量、水汽、碳和甲烷通量及其他环境参数的全面图景。这种方法使我们能够定量理解这些交换，这对于认识绿洲-沙漠相互作用以及支持生态和社会经济的稳定至关重要。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is it critical to maintain a balance between oasis and desert systems in arid regions?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在干旱地区，维持绿洲和沙漠系统之间的平衡至关重要。
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Maintaining a balance between oasis and desert systems is crucial to achieve sustainable development goals in arid regions. Oases play a vital ecological role and support significant economic activities, particularly in western China. Understanding the interactions and energy, water vapor, and carbon exchanges between these ecosystems is essential for ecological stability and socioeconomic development.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在干旱地区，维持绿洲与沙漠系统之间的平衡对于实现可持续发展目标至关重要。绿洲在生态系统中发挥着重要作用，并支持特别是在中国西部的重大经济活动。理解这些生态系统之间的相互作用以及能量、水汽和碳的交换对于生态稳定和社会经济发展至关重要。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences of implementing Eddypro software for processing eddy covariance data in terms of data quality and usability?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 实施Eddypro软件处理涡度协方差数据的潜在后果包括数据质量和可用性方面的影响。
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Implementing Eddypro software for processing eddy covariance data can enhance data quality and usability by applying necessary corrections such as coordinate rotation and frequency response correction. This leads to a more accurate representation of the energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange processes, which is crucial for understanding oasis-desert interactions.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 实施Eddypro软件处理涡度协方差数据可以通过应用必要的修正，如坐标旋转和频率响应修正，来提高数据质量和可用性。这将导致对能量、水蒸气和碳交换过程的更准确表示，这对于理解绿洲-沙漠相互作用至关重要。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How does the exclusion of data with high missing rates or post-precipitation affect the reliability of datasets collected from oasis-desert systems?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 高缺失率或降水后数据的排除如何影响从绿洲-沙漠系统收集的数据集的可靠性？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Excluding data with high missing rates or post-precipitation ensures the reliability of datasets by minimizing errors and biases. This practice improves the quality of half-hourly flux data, leading to more dependable insights into the interactions within oasis-desert ecosystems, which are vital for ecological stability and socioeconomic development.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 排除缺失率高或降水后数据可以确保数据集的可靠性，最小化错误和偏差。这一做法提高了半小时通量数据的质量，从而为对绿洲-沙漠生态系统内相互作用的深入洞察提供了更可靠的基础，这对生态稳定性和社会经济发展至关重要。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the implications of using long-term observational datasets from oasis-desert systems on understanding the carbon balance in arid regions?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用来自绿洲-沙漠系统的长期观测数据集对理解干旱地区的碳平衡的影响是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Using long-term observational datasets from oasis-desert systems provides critical insights into the carbon balance in arid regions. It supports the identification of these areas as carbon sinks, thereby contributing to the global carbon cycle understanding and aiding in achieving carbon neutrality goals in such ecosystems.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用来自绿洲-沙漠系统的长期观测数据集为干旱地区的碳平衡提供了重要的见解。这有助于识别这些地区作为碳汇，从而促进对全球碳循环的理解，并有助于实现这些生态系统的碳中和目标。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the primary objective of collecting and processing long-term energy, water vapor, and carbon flux data in oasis-desert ecosystems?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中收集和处理长期能源、水汽和碳通量数据的主要目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary objective is to understand the basic characteristics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems to achieve the goals of carbon peaking and carbon neutrality, support ecological security, and promote sustainable development of oases.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 主要目标是了解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水汽和碳交换的基本特征，以实现碳达峰和碳中和的目标，支持生态安全，促进绿洲的可持续发展。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to maintain detailed observational datasets involving hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil parameters in arid and semiarid regions?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区，维护涉及水气象、植被和土壤参数的详细观测数据集是重要的原因是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: It is important to maintain these datasets to quantitatively understand the energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis-desert areas, which is crucial for recognizing oasis-desert interactions and protecting ecological stability and socioeconomic development.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 维护这些数据集对于定量理解绿洲-沙漠地区的能量、水汽和碳交换至关重要，这对于认识绿洲-沙漠相互作用以及保护生态稳定和社会经济发展具有重要意义。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures are involved in processing raw eddy covariance data to ensure its quality and usability for energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange studies?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 处理原始涡度协方差数据以确保其质量和可用于能量、水蒸气和碳交换研究的程序包括哪些步骤？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The procedures involved in processing raw eddy covariance data include steps such as despiking to remove outliers, time delay correction, coordinate rotation (second rotation), frequency response correction, sonic virtual temperature correction, and density (WPL) correction. Quality assessment is also performed, focusing on atmospheric stability and turbulent similarity characteristics. The processed data is then screened by removing erroneous data, precipitation-affected data, and data with more than 10% missing rate in the original 10Hz data within a 30-minute period.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 处理原始涡度协方差数据的程序包括以下步骤：去尖峰以去除异常值、时间延迟校正、坐标旋转（第二次旋转）、频率响应校正、声学虚温校正和密度（WPL）校正。还会进行质量评估，重点关注大气稳定性和湍流相似性特征。处理后的数据会经过筛选，去除错误数据、受降水影响的数据，以及在30分钟内原始10Hz数据缺失率超过10%的数据。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How do researchers maintain the balance between oasis and desert systems to achieve sustainable development in arid and semiarid regions?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 研究人员如何在干旱和半干旱地区维持绿洲与沙漠系统之间的平衡，以实现可持续发展？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Researchers maintain the balance between oasis and desert systems by understanding the basic characteristics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in these ecosystems. This understanding is achieved through long-term observations and analyses, which provide quantitative insights into the interactions within oasis–desert areas. Such studies are significant for ecological stability, socioeconomic development, and achieving goals like carbon peaking and carbon neutrality.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 研究人员通过了解绿洲和沙漠系统中能量、水汽和碳交换的基本特征，维持这两种生态系统之间的平衡。这种理解是通过长期观察和分析实现的，提供了对绿洲-沙漠地区内部相互作用的定量洞察。这类研究对生态稳定性、社会经济发展以及实现碳达峰和碳中和等目标具有重要意义。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What methods are used to ensure the reliability and accuracy of hydrometeorological data collected from automatic weather stations in oasis–desert systems?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 确保从绿洲-沙漠系统的自动气象站收集的水文气象数据的可靠性和准确性的方法有哪些？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: To ensure the reliability and accuracy of hydrometeorological data collected from automatic weather stations, the data collection method involves observing parameters like radiation, soil heat flux, temperature profiles, gradients of air temperature and humidity, wind speed and direction, air pressure, precipitation, and soil moisture profiles with a 10-minute average period. These methods are supplemented by additional data such as groundwater table measurements, and the entire dataset undergoes stringent data processing and quality control procedures.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 为了确保从自动气象站收集的水文气象数据的可靠性和准确性，数据收集方法涉及观察辐射、土壤热通量、温度剖面、空气温度和湿度的梯度、风速和风向、气压、降水量以及土壤湿度剖面等参数，平均周期为10分钟。这些方法还辅以额外的数据，如地下水位测量，整个数据集经过严格的数据处理和质量控制程序。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What technological advancements enable the accurate measurement of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些技术进步使得在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中准确测量能量、水蒸气和碳交换成为可能？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The use of eddy covariance systems and scintillometers for measuring turbulent fluxes, along with automatic weather stations for hydrometeorological data with a 10-minute average period, enable accurate measurement of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 使用涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪测量湍流通量，以及自动气象站以10分钟平均周期获取水文气象数据，可以准确测量绿洲-沙漠生态系统中的能量、水蒸气和碳交换。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might data collected using eddy covariance systems in oasis–desert ecosystems require extensive processing and quality control before it can be used for analysis?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中收集的数据使用涡度协方差系统可能需要经过大量处理和质量控制，才能用于分析，原因如下：
Expectation.AnswerEn: Data collected using eddy covariance systems often require extensive processing and quality control to ensure accuracy and reliability. This includes steps like removing outliers, correcting delay times, performing coordinate rotations, and making various atmospheric corrections. Additionally, data quality is assessed based on atmospheric stability and turbulence characteristics. Ensuring such processing is crucial for obtaining meaningful insights into energy, water vapor, and carbon exchanges in oasis–desert ecosystems.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 使用涡度协方差系统收集的数据通常需要经过 extensive 处理和质量控制，以确保准确性和可靠性。这包括去除异常值、校正延迟时间、进行坐标旋转以及进行各种大气修正。此外，数据质量还基于大气稳定性和湍流特征进行评估。确保这些处理对于获得关于绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水蒸气和碳交换的有意义的见解至关重要。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What challenges might arise when establishing long-term observational datasets in arid regions, and how can these affect the expected outcomes of ecological research?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在干旱地区建立长期观测数据集时可能会出现哪些挑战，这些挑战如何影响生态研究的预期结果？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Establishing long-term observational datasets in arid regions can be challenging due to environmental degradation, such as drying rivers, vegetation loss, land desertification, and dust storms. These factors can disrupt data collection and affect the consistency and reliability of datasets, which are essential for understanding energy, water vapor, and carbon exchanges. Such challenges may lead to data gaps and increased difficulty in drawing robust conclusions about ecological dynamics and sustainability in oasis–desert systems.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 在干旱地区建立长期观测数据集可能面临挑战，原因包括环境退化，如河流干涸、植被丧失、土地沙漠化和沙尘暴。这些因素可能会干扰数据收集，并影响数据集的一致性和可靠性，而这些数据集对于理解能量、水蒸气和碳交换至关重要。这些挑战可能导致数据缺口，并增加对绿洲-沙漠系统生态动态和可持续性得出可靠结论的难度。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to maintain a balance between oasis and desert systems, and what are the expected outcomes if this balance is not achieved?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 保持绿洲和沙漠系统之间的平衡是重要的，因为如果这种平衡没有得到维持，可能会导致一系列负面后果。首先，生态系统的失衡可能导致生物多样性的减少，许多依赖于绿洲环境的植物和动物可能会面临生存威胁。其次，水资源的过度开发可能导致绿洲的干涸，从而影响当地社区的生计和饮水供应。此外，沙漠化的加剧可能会导致土壤退化和农业生产力下降，进一步加剧粮食安全问题。最后，生态失衡还可能引发气候变化的加剧，影响更广泛的环境和人类健康。因此，维护绿洲和沙漠系统之间的平衡对于保护生态环境和促进可持续发展至关重要。
Expectation.AnswerEn: Maintaining a balance between oasis and desert systems is crucial to achieve sustainable development and ecological stability in these regions. Oases are vital for supporting local populations and agriculture. If this balance is not achieved, it could lead to ecological degradation, threatening both environmental security and socio-economic development. This balance is also important for achieving goals related to carbon peaking and neutrality, as oasis–desert systems can significantly impact regional and global carbon cycles.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 维持绿洲与沙漠系统之间的平衡对实现这些地区的可持续发展和生态稳定至关重要。绿洲对支持当地人口和农业至关重要。如果这种平衡未能实现，可能会导致生态退化，威胁到环境安全和社会经济发展。这种平衡对于实现碳达峰和碳中和相关目标也很重要，因为绿洲-沙漠系统可以显著影响区域和全球的碳循环。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How would you assess the potential challenges faced in maintaining data quality for long-term observations in arid and semiarid regions?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 如何评估在干旱和半干旱地区维护长期观测数据质量所面临的潜在挑战？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Maintaining data quality in arid and semiarid regions can be challenging due to environmental factors like dust storms and land desertification, which may affect sensor accuracy and data integrity. The data processing steps, including quality evaluations based on atmospheric stability and turbulence characteristics, are essential to mitigate these challenges. Additionally, ensuring the robustness of instruments under harsh climatic conditions is important for reliable long-term data.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区，由于沙尘暴和土地沙漠化等环境因素，维护数据质量可能面临挑战，这些因素可能影响传感器的准确性和数据的完整性。数据处理步骤，包括基于大气稳定性和湍流特征的质量评估，对于减轻这些挑战至关重要。此外，确保仪器在恶劣气候条件下的稳健性对于可靠的长期数据也很重要。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how the data from an eddy covariance system can be processed to ensure high-quality flux measurements in oasis–desert ecosystems.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白如何处理涡度协方差系统的数据，以确保在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中获得高质量的通量测量。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The data from an eddy covariance system is processed using software like Eddypro, which involves steps such as outlier removal, time delay correction, coordinate rotation, frequency response correction, ultrasonic virtual temperature correction, and density (WPL) correction. Additionally, the quality of each flux measurement is evaluated based on atmospheric stationarity and turbulence similarity characteristics.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 涡度协方差系统的数据通过像Eddypro这样的软件进行处理，涉及的步骤包括异常值去除、时间延迟修正、坐标旋转、频率响应修正、超声虚温修正和密度（WPL）修正。此外，每个通量测量的质量还基于大气平稳性和湍流相似性特征进行评估。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I'm unsure about the challenges faced when collecting long-term observational data in arid inland river basins.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我对在干旱内陆河流流域收集长期观察数据时面临的挑战感到不确定。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Challenges in collecting long-term observational data in arid inland river basins include ecological environment degradation issues like the drying up of rivers and lakes, degradation of natural vegetation, intensification of land desertification, and frequent dust storms.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 在干旱内陆河流流域收集长期观察数据的挑战包括生态环境退化问题，如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧以及频繁的沙尘暴。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't make sense of how a dataset from an oasis–desert system can contribute to understanding carbon balance in arid regions.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解来自绿洲-沙漠系统的数据集如何有助于理解干旱地区的碳平衡。
Assertion.AnswerEn: A dataset from an oasis–desert system can contribute to understanding carbon balance in arid regions by providing data on energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes. This information is crucial for recognizing interactions between oasis and desert systems, which affects the carbon balance and plays a significant role in the global carbon cycle.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 来自绿洲-沙漠系统的数据集可以帮助理解干旱地区的碳平衡，通过提供能量、水蒸气和碳通量的数据。这些信息对于认识绿洲和沙漠系统之间的相互作用至关重要，这影响了碳平衡，并在全球碳循环中发挥重要作用。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please suggest a comprehensive approach to collect and process data for understanding energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems, considering the challenges faced in arid and semiarid regions.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请建议一种全面的方法来收集和处理数据，以理解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中的能量、水蒸气和碳交换，考虑到干旱和半干旱地区面临的挑战。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: A comprehensive approach should include the establishment of a suite of observational datasets from both artificial and natural oasis–desert systems. This should involve long-term monitoring of energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes, complemented by auxiliary data on hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil parameters. The use of eddy covariance systems and scintillometers for half-hourly turbulent flux data is recommended. Automatic weather stations can provide hydrometeorological data with a 10-minute average period. Data collection should be followed by robust data processing, quality control, and archiving procedures to ensure data reliability and accessibility.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 一个全面的方法应包括建立一套来自人工和自然绿洲-沙漠系统的观测数据集。这应涉及对能量、水汽和碳通量的长期监测，并辅以水文气象、植被和土壤参数的辅助数据。建议使用涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪获取半小时的湍流通量数据。自动气象站可以提供10分钟平均周期的水文气象数据。数据收集后应进行稳健的数据处理、质量控制和归档程序，以确保数据的可靠性和可获取性。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please propose a dataset expansion strategy to enhance the understanding of hydrometeorological dynamics in the HRB, particularly focusing on the integration of vegetation and soil parameters.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请提出一个数据集扩展策略，以增强对HRB水文气象动态的理解，特别关注植被和土壤参数的整合。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: A dataset expansion strategy could involve the establishment of more flux and meteorological stations across diverse locations within the HRB to capture spatial variability. The inclusion of detailed vegetation and soil surveys can provide additional context for observed fluxes. Collaborations with remote sensing initiatives can enhance spatial coverage and provide continuous monitoring. Furthermore, integrating existing datasets from national and international data centers could provide a more comprehensive understanding of the region's hydrometeorological dynamics.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 一个数据集扩展策略可以涉及在HRB内不同地点建立更多的通量和气象站，以捕捉空间变异性。纳入详细的植被和土壤调查可以为观察到的通量提供额外的背景。与遥感项目的合作可以增强空间覆盖并提供连续监测。此外，整合来自国家和国际数据中心的现有数据集可以提供对该地区水文气象动态的更全面理解。
